title: Romaine with garlic lemon anchovy dressing
ingredients: ['1 head romaine lettuce', '100g (4 oz) Parmesan cheese', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 anchovy fillets, rinsed', '1 dessertspoon fresh lemon juice', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
